reviewText:
This well made DVD ( Excellent visual and audio ) covers many aspects of Dr Doug Graham's 80 10 10 Diet. The lecture and Food prep is informative and Fun.
This diet is making waves in the health, vegan and raw foodist communities. Super Star Athletes are flocking to this diet as the ultimate sports nutrition program.
You learn a lot from the Doctor as he speak inteligently on his subject and prepares beautiful and easy to make healthy low fat raw high fruit and veggie dishes.
This DVD is a must have for anyone interested in health, veganism, sports excellence, raw foodism. Slow down the aging process and buy this DVD today.
